Package com.github.mlposey

Class TranslatorTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.mlposey.TranslatorTest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GoogleTranslatorTest, YandexTranslatorTest

    public class TranslatorTest
extends java.lang.Object
    A test environment for classes that extend Translator. If you choose to implement a new service (i.e., by creating a new class that extends Translator) you can run these tests by creating a test class that extends this class and passing the Key to this constructor. TranslatorTest is primarily meant to test client-server operations and whether subclasses uphold the expected functionality of abstract components. The quality of translations is subject to the algorithms a service uses, not to client-side logic.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void testHasSupport​()
      Translator.hasSupport should produce a true value for English to Russian translations.
      void testIdentify​()
      Translator.identify should recognize 'test' as being from the English language.
      void testIdentify_handleError​()
      Translator.identify should produce an exception when supplied text text that does not belong to any language.
      void testTranslate​()
      Translator.translate should produce a text which is converted from one language (English) to another (Dutch).
      void testTranslate_handleError​()
      Translator.translate should produce an error if supplied text that belongs to no language.

    • Method Detail

      • testIdentify

        public void testIdentify​()
                  throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Translator.identify should recognize 'test' as being from the English language. While assuming English support isn't too far a leap, language support could result in issues here.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • testIdentify_handleError

        public void testIdentify_handleError​()
                              throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Translator.identify should produce an exception when supplied text text that does not belong to any language.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • testHasSupport

        public void testHasSupport​()
                    throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Translator.hasSupport should produce a true value for English to Russian translations. The two services provided (i.e., Yandex.Translate and Google Translate) offer this direction, but others you add may not. If this fails, confirm translation support for the service.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • testTranslate

        public void testTranslate​()
                   throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Translator.translate should produce a text which is converted from one language (English) to another (Dutch). This translation direction exists for Yandex.Translate and Google Translate as of writing this test. If a new service is added and failures arise here, ensure it supports this direction.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • testTranslate_handleError

        public void testTranslate_handleError​()
                               throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Translator.translate should produce an error if supplied text that belongs to no language. It is assumed that using a generated UUID as the text content will not produce valid results.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
